abstract:
The Design and Management of C++ Class Libraries
Arthuir Riel, Vanguard Training

Producing reusable C++ class libraries takes more than justknowing the language: it requires careful design. This tutorialshows how to create truly reusable C++ class libraries. It includeshow to design a minimal public interface, variable-size objects,memory leakage, heuristics for operator overloading, designingreusable base-classes, using inheritance and containment, anddeciding how to place classes in a class library.
title: The design and management of C++ class libraries (abstract)
